page.title: 10 Church Farm
page.content: In our {D block}there is a farm called {Church farm.Mr Tassle}owns the farm.He is also a{school govener}.He has lived in Ulcombe for many years and has a big family.He is a{landowner who owns orchards full of fruit like apples.He grows barley and other crops.He has to get up at 7:00am to get started on his work on the land. He has about {400 acres }which contains mostly orchards and fields with wheat,barley and corn.He started farming when he was{14}years of age.There are {7}people working for him,{4 men}and {3 ladies.}His best season for working is the autumn, September to October. He has strawberrys ,apples. The { {apples}cost most and the only animals he has got are three dogs called Dotty,Spotty and Lady. { }
